attributes.action: ISP's should relax the rules on download limits and peak period restrictions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ISP's are putting restrictions on their packages without prior notice to their customers and adjusting that time period also without notice, which is unfair on internet users. I do agree that there should be a peak period but ISP's vary it from time to time, they choose between 4pm - 11pm or 6pm - 11pm but peak time should be if any between 4pm - 9pm for when kids and employed people are at home 5 Hrs instead of the currant 5-7 Hrs

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
